help.cmd_start: Register bot and get invite link

help.cmd_quiz: Enter private chat quiz entry (not yet available)

help.cmd_batch_points: Batch add points (sensitive operation, admin actions are logged)
help.cmd_get_group_id: Get group ID in group (printed to logs)
help.cmd_draw: Draw lottery for multiple specified ID users

news.usage:
ğŸ“° Usage:
In private chat send:
/news Optional title\nLink1\nLink2 ...

If first line is not a link, it will be used as title; otherwise use default title.
Supports multiple links in multiple lines or multiple links in one paragraph.
